Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover how perfect potatoes, bubblicious gumballs, sinfully delicious hot chocolate, and finger lickin' barbecue ribs gets to the masses. From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory reveals the wonders of how food is really made.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrijte, kako pridejo na police trgovin popoln krompir, sladkarije, vroča čokolada in božanska rebrca. V oddaji Tovarna hrane vam razkrijemo osupljivo pot od sestavin do končnega izdelka.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: It's something you likely do every day. Whether it's telling a little white lie or a serious betrayal, your brain is built to know when tweaking the truth can be beneficial. Think about how many times you've told a lie to spare someone's feelings, or bent the truth to get out of plans. The truth is we're all liars.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Večina ljudi se zlaže do 200-krat dnevno, čeprav znanost pravi, da je govorjenje po resnici nevrološko preprostejše. Zakaj lažemo?

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Revealing that we may not be as smart as we think, we explore whether we have as good a grasp of the world around us as we like to believe!
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Razkrili bomo, da morda nismo tako pametnim kot si mislimo in raziskali, če res tako dobro razumemo svet okoli nas, kot si predstavljamo!

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Failsafes are built into every aspect of aviation, but in the heat of the moment pilots can make fateful decisions that lead to tragedy.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ko piloti na hitro sprejemajo odločitve, se lahko že majhna napaka spremeni v grozno tragedijo. Obravnavamo grozljivo strmoglavljenje letala v reko.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Airplane crashes involving high-profile passengers make international headlines, placing investigators under tremendous pressure to come up with answers.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ko se v letalski nesreči znajdejo tudi pomembni potniki, je vsa pozornost svetovne javnosti obrnjena proti preiskovalcem, ki so pod ogromnim pritiskom.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: On the border between Brazil and Paraguay, a random search of a motorbike taxi uncovers various undeclared electronic devices. A further investigation of the young driver reveals even more undeclared goods.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Na meji med Brazilijo in Paragvajem preiskava taksija razkrije veliko število neprijavljenih elektronskih naprav.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Over 30 kg of cocaine bricks are found on one flight. A pregnant woman may be hiding something. And, an arrested carrier tells a tragic story.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V tej epizodi policija najde več kot 35 kilogramov kokaina, namenjenega na afriški kontinent. Carinska policija pa poskuša ugotoviti, kaj skriva nosečnica.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A young father learns a hard lesson chasing a gangster lifestyle when he is set up as a decoy on a smuggling trip from Peru.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Mladega očeta izuči, ko mu podtaknejo med tihotapljenjem iz Peruja.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: The Itaipu Dam is the world's largest hydro-electric power plant and a triumph of engineering. Discover how it was built against impossible odds.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Jez Itaipu je največja hidroelektrarna na svetu in izjemen dosežek inženiringa. Odkrili bomo, kako so ga zgradili navkljub vsem oviram.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: It is the largest folk festival in the world: the Munich Oktoberfest. A gigantic pop-up fair complete with beer halls, roller coasters and booths on an area the size of 50 football fields. There must be no delays during assembly. Everything must be in place on opening day.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Oktoberfest je največji ljudski festival na svetu. Obsega velikost kar 50 nogometnih igrišč, kjer najdemo pivske hale, vrtiljake in še marsikaj. Pri postavljanju pa ne sme biti zamud.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In this episode we learn how to lift a space shuttle, what bridges and planes have in common, and why brakes are so important.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V tokratni oddaji bomo izvedeli, kako dvignemo raketoplan, kaj imajo skupnega mostovi in letala in zakaj so zavore tako pomembne.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In this episode we learn how to build a trebuchet, what keeps a crane upright, and the marvels of hydraulics.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V tokratni oddaji bomo izvedeli, kako izdelamo katapult, kaj drži žerjav pokonci in spoznali bomo čudežno hidravliko.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Rob Lowe counts down the best ads of the ‘80s, uncovering the secrets behind spots like Bud’s Spuds MacKenzie, "Where's the Beef" and Apple's "1984."
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Rob Lowe nam bo predstavil najboljše oglase iz 80. let.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A spectacular aerial journey across Italy reveals dredging boats in Venice, the ladder top fishermen of Sicily and a winter school for supercars.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Potovanje po nebu nad Italijo razkrije čolne v Benetkah, ribiče na Siciliji in zimsko šolo za super avtomobile.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A spectacular aerial journey across Germany reveals a factory the size of a city, a fairy-tale castle and the largest land vehicle on Earth.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Potovanje po nebu nad Nemčijo razkrije tovarno v velikosti mesta, pravljičen grad in največje kopensko vozilo na svetu.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Carsten Peter joins forces with storm chaser Tim Samaras to shoot some electrifying pictures of lightning for National Geographic magazine.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Carsten Peter združi moči z lovcem na nevihte Timom Samarasom, da bi za revijo National Geographic posnel nekaj fotografij strel.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Intrepid angler Jeremy Wade searches for the elusive Amazon bull shark to see what the ferocious predator can reveal about the health of the river.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Jeremy Wade v Amazonki išče krvoločnega plenilca, ki lahko razkrije marsikaj o čistoči reke.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: WWII’s greatest aviation mysteries brought to the surface for the first time. Revealing the real story lies as much in the sea, as it does it the air.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Prvič bomo spoznali največje letalske skrivnosti iz druge svetovne vojne. Prava zgodba se skriva tako v morju kot v zraku.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Archaeologists investigate the queens of ancient Egypt, and enter an unexplored pyramid for the first time in over 4000 years.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Arheologi raziskujejo kraljice starega Egipta in vstopijo v neraziskano piramido prvič po 4.000 letih.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Archaeologists investigate how robbers looted the pyramids and tombs of ancient Egypt, and what clues they left behind.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Arheologi raziskujejo, kako so tatovi opustošili piramide in grobnice starega Egipta in kaj so pustili za seboj.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Japan is an archipelago of immeasurable natural wealth. The large southern islands, Shikoku, Kyushu and Okinawa, with their relaxed atmosphere, are the cradle of Japanese spirituality.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Japonska je otočje izjemnih naravnih bogastev. Veliki južni otoki Šikoku, Kyušu in Okinava s sproščenim vzdušjem so zibelka japonske duhovnosti.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Impact with Gal Gadot is a documentary that follows the powerful stories of six women who are making an extraordinary impact on their communities around the world.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Izjemne ženske z Gal Gadot je dokumentarec, ki sledi močnim zgodbam šestih žensk, ki imajo neverjeten vpliv na skupnosti po vsem svetu.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: National Geographic correspondent Alexandra Roca investigates ecotourism and conservation efforts in Mexico.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Z dopisnico Alexandro Roca bomo preiskovali ekološki turizem in okoljevarstvena prizadevanja v Mehiki.

Detail.ORIGINAL_TITLE_SERIES: Ancient Worlds Revealed with Albert Lin 1
Detail.LOCAL_SERIES_TITLE: Odkrivanje starodavnih svetov z Albertom Linom
Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Albert Lin’s journeys take him to the tomb of China’s first emperor and the basalt stone kingdom of Nan Madol in Micronesia.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Alberta Lina pot odpelje v grobnico prvega kitajskega cesarja in bazaltno kraljestvo Nan Madol v Mikroneziji.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: What would life on Earth be like if the planet was ravaged by bizarre, deadly weather phenomena? Could humanity endure a neverending super storm?
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Kakšno bi bilo življenje na Zemlji, če bi planet opustošili nenavadni vremenski pojavi? Bi lahko človeštvo preživelo neprekinjeno supernevihto?

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In Antarctica, close-knit communities of scientists, engineers, and hardened field vets have forged an existence unlike anything on our planet.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ekipa z gore Erbus ima težave s pristankom na eni izmed lokaciji, nato pa se zaradi mraza pokvari še računalniška oprema. Medtem ladja obalne straže lomi led, da bi pospremili tankerje do celine, a se jim pokvari motor, zato obtičijo sredi morja.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Scientists focus their research in Antarctica's icy waters to determine how climate change and human interference affect the marine ecosystem.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: "Živa bitja na Antarktiki morajo prestati najbolj negostoljubno podnebje na svetu. Največ življenja uspeva v morju, saj je tam veliko hranilnih snovi in plena. Znanstveniki proučujejo, kako na morski ekosistem vplivajo podnebne spremembe in ljudje. "

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Photographer Michael Nichols teams up with a group of climbers and scientists to photograph a giant redwood tree in California.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Fotograf Michael Nichols se s skupino alpinistov in znanstvenikov odpravi fotografirat ogromno sekvojo v Kaliforniji.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: When the bad weather arrives, the good times start for Thord, and it's bad times for the foreign and Norwegian truck drivers.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ko pride slabo vreme, je to dober znak za Thorda, a slab za tuje in norveške tovornjakarje. Na severu se spopadejo z gozdnim izzivom, ko se prevrne nakladalnik in z blatno luknjo, v kateri je obtičal bager.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Tim Shaw's scientific experiments continue, as he tests an assault rifle, looks at a laser beam and tries out an unusual way of making popcorn.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Tim Shaw bo z izjemnimi poskusi testiral puško, raziskal laserski žarek in poskusil na nenavaden način izdelati pokovko.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Exercise caution when headbanging, attempting a swan lift, or jumping into a bin, or you could embarrass and even injure yourself.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Med butanjem z glavo, poskusom dviga človeka ali skokom v smetnjak bodite previdni, drugače se lahko poškodujete ali osramotite.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In the south, Bjorn gets both work and frustration from nature - he helps a car with frozen fuel, and then the road closes because the reindeer are too close to the road.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Na jugu ima Bjoern veliko dela, narava pa mu para živce, ko mora pomagati avtu z zmrznjenim gorivom, nato pa zaradi severnih jelenov zaprejo cesto. Na severu morajo rešiti tovornjak, poln rib, in prekucnik, ki je izgubil gred.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A brand-new pop-science/engineering 'game show' that challenges the global public to pick the right outcome of incredible experiments.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Popolnoma nov poljudno-znanstveni kviz, ki bo gledalce pozval, da se odločijo glede rezultata nekaterih neverjetnih poskusov.

Detail.LOCAL_EPISODE_TITLE: Smučarski triki in vožnja po vodi
Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: We learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when driving over water, operating a crane and performing aerial tricks on skis.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Poglejte, kako se lahko osramotite ali poškodujete med vožnjo po vodi, upravljanjem z žerjavom in akrobacijami na smučeh.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: The series examines how science is behind almost every physical thing that happens in our everyday lives. In this episode we learn how to pull a plane, drive on sand, swim faster, ride a one wheelеd bike and most crucially, chill wine with grapes.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Serija raziskuje znanost za skoraj vsakim fizikalnim pojavom v naših vsakodnevnih življenjih. V tej epizodi bomo izvedeli, kako vleči letalo, voziti po pesku, plavati hitreje, kako voziti monocikel in ohladiti kozarec z grozdjem.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover how the most delectable cold smoked salmon, culture-rich yogurt, perfect pouches of ravioli, and the freshest garden salad gets to the masses. From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory reveals the wonders of how food is really made.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrijte, kako pridejo na police trgovin vrhunski dimljeni losos, jogurt, popolni ravioli in sveža solata. V oddaji Tovarna hrane vam razkrijemo osupljivo pot od sestavin do končnega izdelka.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: This is a show about your brain and how it perceives the world in 3D. Through a series of fun interactive games, youll learn how your brain is like a time machine that can actually "see" into the future! Youll also learn how you share a special ability with Superman you both have X-ray vision. Get ready to see it but dont believe it on Brain Games.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrili bomo, kako so vaši možgani lahko časovni stroj, ki "vidi" v prihodnost in izvedeli, zakaj imate rentgenski vid kot Superman.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Why does it seem like men are from Mars and women are from Venus? How can men and women look at the same world and see completely different things? Or solve the same problem two completely different ways?
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Razkrili bomo razlike med moškimi in ženskimi možgani, odkrili, kdo bi samo z močjo možganov zmagal v ultimativni bitki med spoloma.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Chris and Jessi seek out new locations to secure a precious source of meat while Michael creates a new method of training his dogs. Meanwhile, Johnny walks on thin ice to prepare for winter.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Chris in Jessi Morse morata poiskati nove lokacije, kjer bi našla dragoceni vir mesa za zimo, Michael Manzo ustvari nov način šolanja svojih sankaških psov.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: While Chris and Jessi build a mobile cabin to broaden their trapping locations, the Rowlands build a sauna in hopes of staying healthy. Meanwhile, Michael tries to prepare for a worst-case scenario.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Chris in Jessi Morse zgradita mobilno kočo, da bi razširila območje lova, Rowlands pa zgradi savno v upanju, da bi ostali zdravi med pandemijo in ostro zimo.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: The guys are in Galveston, Texas, where Sean meets the owner of a derringer pistol, similar to the one used to assassinate Abraham Lincoln.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Fantje so v Galvestonu v Teksasu, kjer se Sean sreča z lastnikom pištole Derringer, podobne tisti, s katero so ustrelili Abrahama Lincolna.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: While the fleet is docked, one boat takes a chance to gain ground on the others. But facing fog, wind, and high seas alone could spell disaster.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Vsi so zasidrani, ena ladja pa vseeno hoče pridobiti prednost pred ostalimi. To pa je lahko katastrofalno, saj je megleno in vetrovno.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Hans is wrapping up a long grouper fishing trip when Nick calls to let him know that the fishery is facing a snapper shortfall, and he'll need to catch 5,000 lbs before he returns to dock. Unfortunately, Hans can't find a spot where the fish are biting, and when he calls his uncle Kenny for advice.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Hans zaključuje z ribolovom, ko mu Nick pove, da jim zmanjkuje hlastačev in da mora ujeti več kot dve toni rib, preden se vrne. Žal Hans ne najde kraja, kjer ribe prijemajo, zato pokliče strica Kennyja, da bi ga vprašal za nasvet.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Lee and Brian submit a sealed bid for the demolition of a police station. But once there, the team must avoid swarms upon swarms of bees!
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Lee in Brian oddata skrito ponudbo za rušenje policijske postaje. Ko pa z ekipo prispe do stavbe, jih preplavijo roji čebel!

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Hazen Audel joins local tribesmen in the Dulong valley, South West China. They head out on a mission to the snow capped mountains to gather highly valuable medicinal herbs and honey from hives.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Hazen Auden se pridruži domačinom plemena v dolini Dulong na jugozahodu Kitajske. Tam so gozdovi, polni strupenih kač in medvedov.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Hazen Audel joins the Biasha, the last tribe in China allowed to bear arms, in their mountain village in Guizhou - he must hunt and catch a haul of fish, only then will he be seen as a man.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Hazen Audel obišče Biashe, zadnje kitajsko pleme, ki sme posedovati orožje. Z njimi se loti vodnih bivolov in kober ter se poda v strme doline in med divje slapove.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A real-life concrete jungle, hillside tunnels dug to defend an empire, and a gloomy facility hidden deep in the Soviet backcountry. Within these decaying structures are the echoes of history; each haunted shell now ready to tell its own unique story.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Asfaltna džungla, tuneli za obrambo imperija in depresiven kompleks sredi Rusije. Vsi nam bodo predstavili svojo edinstveno zgodbo.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: 20 years after the explosion of the AZF factory in Toulouse, France, first-hand witnesses recount their memories of this tragic day.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: 20 let po eksploziji v francoski tovarni AZF priče iz prve roke podoživljajo spomine na ta dan.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In 1990 a lethal fire broke out on the Scandinavian Star ferry during the early hours while passengers slept. Many were overcome by fumes and died. Investigators piece together the events and ask whether it was accident or arson.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Leta 1990 je na ladji Scandinavian Star v zgodnjih jutranjih urah, ko so potniki še spali, izbruhnil smrtonosni požar. Mnoge je zajel ogenj in so umrli. Preiskovalci popišejo dogodke in se vprašajo, ali je bila nesreča ali požig.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: When Alaska Airlines Flight 261 suddenly nosedives into the Pacific, investigators uncover a critical maintenance issue with deadly implications.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ko letalo družbe Alaska Airlines nenadoma strmoglavi v Tihi ocean, preiskovalci odkrijejo težave, ki lahko vodijo v smrt.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Disasters like the MS Estonia and both 737 crashes are rare, but they are stark reminders of the speed at which tragedy can strike.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Katastrofe, kot je bila MS Estonia ali pa strmoglavljeni letali 737, so sicer redke, a vseeno dober opomnik.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A young father learns a hard lesson chasing a gangster lifestyle when he is set up as a decoy on a smuggling trip from Peru.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Mladega očeta izuči, ko mu podtaknejo med tihotapljenjem iz Peruja.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: As they start to zero in on a suspect, Ryker and Dani get new assignments - but that won’t stop them from chasing their lead.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Vse oči se uprejo v "G. Z." Ko se začnejo približevati osumljencu, dobita Ryker in Dani nove naloge, a to jima ne bo preprečilo iskanje osumljenca.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: With two suspects in question, Ryker’s own beliefs about the case are tested. As pressure from the FBI rises, Bruce unravels.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Na vrhu sta dva osumljenca in Rykerjeva prepričanja glede primera so na preizkušnji. FBI povečuje pritisk in Bruce je pod velikim stresom.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Rob Lowe counts down the best ads of the ‘80s, uncovering the secrets behind spots like Bud’s Spuds MacKenzie, "Where's the Beef" and Apple's "1984."
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Rob Lowe nam bo predstavil najboljše oglase iz 80. let.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In the untouched peninsula of Istria, Croatia, Chef Ramsay dives, fishes and chases farm animals to unearth some world-class culinary gems.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Na nedotaknjenem polotoku Istre na Hrvaškem se kuhar Ramsay potaplja, preganja in ​​lovi rejne živali, da bi razkril nekaj vrhunskih kulinaričnih draguljev.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Jeremy Wade’s fishing adventure through Iceland’s river systems in search of the elusive Atlantic salmon, a fish that even he has never caught before.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Jeremy Wade se bo podal po rečnih sistemih Islandije. Tam bo iskal vrsto lososa, ki je ni še nikoli ujel.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Plenty of water, warmth and light provide perfect conditions for life to thrive and make the jungles the most diverse lands on Earth. But make no mistake, this is no Eden.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Izobilje vode, toplote in svetlobe omogoča popolne življenjske razmere. Zato so džungle med najbolj raznolikimi okolju na svetu. A to vseeno ni raj.

Detail.ORIGINAL_EPISODE_TITLE: Channing Tatum In The Mountains of Norway
Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Channing Tatum returns for his second adventure with Bear Grylls, and this time he's put to the test in the wilds of Norway!
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Minilo je pet let, odkar je Channing Tatum prvič nastopil v oddaji, zdaj se je vrnil in hoče se več. Z Bearom Gryllsom se bo podal v divjino Norveške.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Comedic actor Rob Riggle joins Bear Grylls on an adventure on Iceland's Vatnajokull glacier. They must navigate treacherous terrain and find a way to survive the frigid night.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Komik in igralec Rob Riggle preveri svoje preživetvene sposobnosti. Z Bearom se poda na enkratno avanturo na islandskem ledeniku Vatnajokull.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Plenty of water, warmth and light provide perfect conditions for life to thrive and make the jungles the most diverse lands on Earth. But make no mistake, this is no Eden.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Izobilje vode, toplote in svetlobe omogoča popolne življenjske razmere. Zato so džungle med najbolj raznolikimi okolju na svetu. A to vseeno ni raj.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Join biologist and photographer Mark Moffett on a globe-trekking quest to document the world's pollinators in action.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Pridružili se bomo biologu in fotografu Marku Moffetu na popotovanju okoli sveta, na katerem želi med delom dokumentirati svetovne opraševalce.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Bjorn Laegreid heads out into the storm to help a truck and clear the road for the ploughers, but ends up stuck himself and unable to help.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Bjørn se odpravi v nevihto, da bi pomagal tovornjaku in s plugi očistil cesto, na koncu pa tudi sam obtiči. Thord počne nekaj, česar sicer ne, njegova ekipa pa dela na gori. Marius mora poskrbeti za prevrnjen tovornjak.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Tim Shaw uses science to explore the explosive power of beauty products and the best way to overpower a Venice Beach weightlifter.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Tim Shaw bo z izjemnimi poskusi testiral eksplozivno moč kozmetičnih izdelkov in poiskal najboljši način, kako premagati dvigovalca uteži.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Some people can dive into the sea from giant cliffs and emerge unscathed, while others end up bloody after diving from the bank of a river.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Nekateri ljudje lahko v morje skočijo z visokih skal in ostanejo nepoškodovani, drugi pa končajo v krvi že, ko v reko skočijo z brega.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Thord, Bjorn and the guys get together to take a look back on the season and ponder a video recording of a rescue mission gone horribly wrong.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Thord in Bjoern se zbereta z drugimi, da bi se pogovorili o sezoni. Zgodbe o življenju in smrti, iznajdljivosti, slabem vremenu in bizarnostih. Pri Olavu se spominjajo trenutkov, zaradi katerih bi ljudje jokali, se smejali ali kričali.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A brand-new pop-science/engineering 'game show' that challenges the global public to pick the right outcome of incredible experiments.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Popolnoma nov kviz s področja zabavne znanosti in strojništva, ki gledalce pozove, da izberejo rezultate neverjetnih preizkusov.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: This episode delivers winning tips and scientific explanantions on competitive speed eating, what colour to wear to be attractive, how to avoid a fizzy drink fiasco, wrestling tips so you can topple anyone and the secret to seeing in the dark.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Predstavili bomo nasvete in znanstveno pojasnili tekmovanja v žretju, kakšno barvo nositi, če hočete biti privlačni, kako se izogniti katastrofi z gazirano pijačo, nasvete za rokoborbo, s katerimi boste premagali vsakogar in kako videti v temi.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover how slow cooked bagels, delicious airplane food, crunchy multigrain Sun Chips?; and the tastiest organic vegan carrot cake gets to the masses. From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory reveals the wonders of how food is really made.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrijte, kako pridejo na police trgovin počasi kuhane žemljice, hrustljav čips in veganska korenčkova torta. V oddaji Tovarna hrane vam razkrijemo osupljivo pot od sestavin do končnega izdelka.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Every day, you are competing – either with yourself or someone else. Discover what it is about the human brain that makes you want to win.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Vsak dan tekmujete - s sabo ali s kom drugim. Odkrili bomo, zakaj so naši možgani naravnani tako, da si želijo zmage.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover how your brain perceives the world as experts in cognitive science, neuroscience and psychology explain the 'why' behind the 'wow'.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Se da možgane izboljšati, kot znamo izboljšati elektronske naprave? Odgovor vas bo mogoče presenetil. V tem delu postavimo možgane na največjo preizkušnjo.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Max and Mischa go on a global trip to find hi-tech ways to turn themselves into superhumans. They'll will uncover technology straight out of science fiction - wearable technology designed to give humans the abilities of their favourite superheroes - from exoskeletons to jet powered backpack.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Max in Mischa po svetu iščeta tehnološko napredne načine, kako postati močnejši in hitrejši superčlovek. Odkrijeta tehnologijo, za katero se zdi, da izvira iz znanstvenofantastičnega filma, nosljivo tehnologijo, ki ljudem daje supermoči.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: This series of spectacular aerial journeys reveals the secrets of the world's most extraordinary countries.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ta oddaja nam ponudi pogled na najizjemnejše države sveta na povsem nov način. Vidimo vse od grške akropole do gradnje najdaljšega mostu v Turčiji in finskih ledolomilk. Od zgoraj ugledamo tradicije in inovacije v samem srcu današnjih držav.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In the early 80's America emerges from a recession and goes into an era of conspicuous consumption. Widely available credit cards spark a spending frenzy and competing brands battle to make a sale.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: ZDA se prebije iz recesije in takoj se začne obdobje potrošnje. Kreditne kartice postanejo splošno dostopne in znamke tekmujejo za kupce. Pri oglaševanju začnejo posegati po seksu. Znamenito znamko skoraj uniči pretirano spreminjanje podobe.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: WWII’s greatest aviation mysteries brought to the surface for the first time. Revealing the real story lies as much in the sea, as it does it the air.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Prvič bomo spoznali največje letalske skrivnosti iz druge svetovne vojne. Prava zgodba se skriva tako v morju kot v zraku.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: When Alaska Airlines Flight 261 suddenly nosedives into the Pacific, investigators uncover a critical maintenance issue with deadly implications.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ko letalo družbe Alaska Airlines nenadoma strmoglavi v Tihi ocean, preiskovalci odkrijejo težave, ki lahko vodijo v smrt.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In this episode we learn just how many ways there are to embarrass and injure yourself when attempting a tandem motorbike wheelie and trampolining with friends.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V oddaji združujemo znanost in spektakularno boleče posnetke. Tokrat bomo izvedeli, kako se je mogoče osramotiti ter poškodovati pri vožnji po zadnjem kolesu v dvoje in skakanju na trampolinu s prijatelji.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Weather Gone Viral is an exciting series which reveals some of the most engaging and memorial on-air moments in the world of weather.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V tej zanimivi oddaji izpostavimo najbolj ekstremne vremenske pojave, kar jih je bilo ujetih na film. Pogovarjamo se s preživelimi, ki so navkljub majhnim možnostim premagali naravo. Poklonimo pa se tudi vremenoslovcem in novinarjem.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Tensions rise between Jim and Duane when the busyness of the summer causes Job details to slip through the cracks. Mean while Austin racks his brain to figure out how to fix a downed haul truck. Finally Aven works around the clock to fix the blown main engine of a fishing vessel stuck at the dock.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Napetost med Jimom in Duanom narašča. Austin razmišlja, kako popraviti tovornjak. Aven gara, da bi popravil motor ribiške barke.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: The remarkable story of the New York flight which crash landed in the middle of the city, having struck a flock of birds on take-off.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Neverjetna zgodba o newyorškem letu, ki je zasilno pristal sredi mesta potem, ko je med vzletom naletel na jato ptic.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: When music-loving hippie Michael Morey learned he and his girlfriend were expecting a baby, he agreed to smuggle cocaine from Ecuador to Europe.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ko je nad glasbo navdušen hipi Michael Morey izvedel, da je dekle noseče, je pristal na ponudbo, da pretihotapi kokain iz Ekvadorja v Evropo.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover how gooey, crunchy, rainbow marshmallow squares, nostril-flaring sushi sidekick wasabi, scrumptious meatless sausages, and sinfully flaky mini chocolate croissants get to the masses. From raw materials to finished products, FOOD FACTORY reveals the wonders of how food is really made.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrijte, kako riž in sladkor postaneta hrustljava ploščica z barvitim posipom in kako spasirajo japonsko rastlino v delikatno pikantno prilogo k sušiju.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Follow the trajectory of McDonald’s French Fries; Cracker Jack makes candy by the truckload; a pizza factory grinds 6-million pounds of cheese a year.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Oglejte si ves postopek priprave pomfrita v McDonald'su. V Cracker Jacku izdelujejo ogromne količine sladkarij. V tovarni za pripravo pice naribajo tri milijone kilogramov sira na leto.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Learn the secret behind America’s favorite mustard; meet the workers who stitch together Turduckens; and 20 tons of gooey caramel a day go into Affy Tapples caramel apples.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrijte skrivnost najbolj priljubljene gorčice v Ameriki. Spoznajte delavce, ki šivajo nadevano pečenko iz treh vrst perutnine. V Affy Tapple za karamelna jabolka porabijo po 20 ton karamele na dan.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Both teams go on a mission to find and strip a prestige British Classic Car to get maximum cash from its parts. Frankie and Ben seek out a Rolls Royce, while Dean and George fancy their chances with a Jaguar Sovereign.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ferrari, Porche, Lamborghini in Alfa Romeo so legende. Vendar ali lahko ekipe najdejo športno legendo za največ 1000 GBP?

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In this episode we learn the science behind the fails, when unloading a truck, multi-tasking or backflipping on a motorbike.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V 8. sezoni Znanosti o neumnosti Dallas Campbell združi resno znanost z najbolj odštekanimi in neverjetnimi posnetki gledalcev. Znanstveno razložimo, zakaj je prišlo do polomij, pri tem pa si pomagamo z animacijo in počasnimi posnetki.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: In this episode we learn the science behind the fails, when towing a boat, building a tree swing and attempting a barefoot water-ski tumble.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V 8. sezoni Znanosti o neumnosti Dallas Campbell združi resno znanost z najbolj odštekanimi in neverjetnimi posnetki gledalcev. V tem delu spoznamo znanost, s katero lahko razložimo polomije pri vleki čolna, gradnji gugalnice in smučanju na vodi.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover how your brain perceives the world as experts in cognitive science, neuroscience and psychology explain the 'why' behind the 'wow'.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Naš um je na nešteto načinov povezan z našim telesom. V tem delu boste ugotovili, kako včasih lepo sodelujeta, drugič pa pride med njima do kratkega stika.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Everyone likes to think they're unique, but, like it or not, much of your behaviour is influenced by you copying other people.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: V tem delu odkrijemo, kako hitro se odločimo slediti vodji. Vsak si rad misli, da je samosvoj, a na naše vedenje močno vpliva ponavljanje za drugimi. To bomo prikazali z več igrami.

Detail.LOCAL_EPISODE_TITLE: Sušeno meso, kolači in kocke sladkorja
Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Discover the preferred outer space protein among astronauts; watch as raw sugar is made into Domino's sugar cubes; and brownies are baked in a Ferris wheel-style oven.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Odkrijte, katera beljakovina je priljubljena med astronavti. Oglejte si, kako iz surovega sladkorja delajo sladkorne kocke Domino. Rjavčke pečejo v pečici, ki spominja na panoramsko kolo.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Meet the famous cookies that make millions for charity; an ice cream sandwich combining vanilla and chocolate; and see the HQ of cheese-filled pretzel pockets.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Predstavljamo vam kekse, ki dobrodelni organizaciji prinašajo milijone, vaniljevo-čokoladni sladoledni sendvič in sedež podjetja, ki izdeluje žepke iz testa za preste.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: National Geographic explorer and scientist Albert Lin travels to Acre, Israel, in search of the lost fortunes of the mysterious Knights Templar.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Raziskovalec in znanstvenik Albert Lin se odpravi v Izrael, da bi našel izgubljene zaklade skrivnostnih templjarjev.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Hog Wild has struggled to make its mark all season. Now halfway through the competition, it’s now or never if the new boat wants to stay in the game.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Hog Wild se že vso sezono trudi pustiti svoj pečat. Na polovici tekmovanja se morajo izkazati, če hočejo še ostati v igri.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: After a Boeing 727’s near-fatal nosedive over Michigan, investigators risk their own lives to determine why TWA Flight 841 fell out of the sky.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Po skoraj smrtonosnem letu čez Michigan preiskovalci tvegajo svoja življenja, da ugotovijo, zakaj je letalo skoraj strmoglavilo.

Detail.ORIGINAL_TITLE_SERIES: To Catch A Smuggler: Travel Advisory 1
Detail.LOCAL_SERIES_TITLE: Na sledi tihotapcem: Nasveti za pot
Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: JFK sees plenty illicit activity. CBP and HIS work hard to stop it.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: JFK je zelo prometno letališče. Tu pogosto odkrijejo kakšnega tihotapca kokaina, heroina ali MDMA-ja, ali nezakonita dejanja.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A 70s hippie turns multimillionaire shipping tons of pot into the US, until one of the biggest busts in history forces him on the run.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Hipi iz 70. let postane multimilijonar zaradi tihotapljenja ton trave v ZDA, potem pa mora na beg.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A young father learns a hard lesson chasing a gangster lifestyle when he is set up as a decoy on a smuggling trip from Peru.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Mladega očeta izuči, ko mu podtaknejo med tihotapljenjem iz Peruja.

Detail.ORIGINAL_TITLE_SERIES: To Catch A Smuggler: Travel Advisory 1
Detail.LOCAL_SERIES_TITLE: Na sledi tihotapcem: Nasveti za pot
Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: JFK sees plenty illicit activity. CBP and HIS work hard to stop it.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: JFK je zelo prometno letališče. Tu pogosto odkrijejo kakšnega tihotapca kokaina, heroina ali MDMA-ja, ali nezakonita dejanja.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Wildlife photographer Paul Nicklen travels to British Columbia in an attempt to capture a picture of the rare and elusive white bear.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Fotograf Paul Nicklen odpotuje v Britansko Kolumbijo, da bi poskusil v objektiv ujeti redkega in težko dosegljivega belega medveda.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Thord is a part of a crime scene investigation. Kristoffer and Erik get more that their fair share off road sushi and rookie Andrej faces an overloaded car.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Začenja se nova sezona za norveške reševalce. Pripravljeni so na novo zahtevno zimsko sezono. Thord sodeluje pri preiskavi kraja zločina, Kristoffer in Erik imata opravka z ribami, Andrej pa ima težave s preveč naloženim vozilom.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A brand-new pop-science/engineering 'game show' that challenges the global public to pick the right outcome of incredible experiments.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Popolnoma nov kviz s področja zabavne znanosti in strojništva, ki gledalce pozove, da izberejo rezultate neverjetnih preizkusov.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: We learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when walking downstairs, giving a piggyback and climbing a ladder.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Poglejte, kako se lahko osramotite ali poškodujete med hojo navzdol, prenašanjem na hrbtu ali plezanjem po lestvi.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: Thord is a part of a crime scene investigation. Kristoffer and Erik get more that their fair share off road sushi and rookie Andrej faces an overloaded car.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Začenja se nova sezona za norveške reševalce. Pripravljeni so na novo zahtevno zimsko sezono. Thord sodeluje pri preiskavi kraja zločina, Kristoffer in Erik imata opravka z ribami, Andrej pa ima težave s preveč naloženim vozilom.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: A brand-new pop-science/engineering 'game show' that challenges the global public to pick the right outcome of incredible experiments.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Popolnoma nov kviz s področja zabavne znanosti in strojništva, ki gledalce pozove, da izberejo rezultate neverjetnih preizkusov.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: We learn just how many ways there are to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when walking downstairs, giving a piggyback and climbing a ladder.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Poglejte, kako se lahko osramotite ali poškodujete med hojo navzdol, prenašanjem na hrbtu ali plezanjem po lestvi.

Detail.SYNOPSIS_ENGLISH: This show helps mere mortals become gods by showing them how to win at almost anything and everything. Today we learn how to build a paper plane, make a movie projector for a cell phone, improve memory and most importantly create a delicious fruit salad using karate moves.
Detail.SYNOPSIS: Ta oddaja bo pokazala, kako običajni smrtniki lahko postanejo bogovi in večni zmagovalci. Danes bomo izvedeli, kako narediti papirnato letalo, projektor iz mobilnika, izboljšati spomin in kako narediti sadno solato s karate udarci.
